name: Vegetable★Mash
description:
You have just inherited a small vegetable growing farm and have your sights set on riches! With a couple genetically enhanced seeds in hand, you set out to grow rare veggies. Pick up a seed and plant them in any of the growing zones. Select the veggies with rare traits and splice them together to combine their DNA. Who knows what you can come up with!

Controls

Gamepad is supported!

  • WASD / Arrow keys / Left Analog / DPAD: Move
  • E / Enter / Space / Any Button: Interact
Cheats

If you need more money, type motherlode.

Credits

Made by Shirakumo

  • Nicolas Hafner
  • Janne Pakarinen
